title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item in library outline view for the first time
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view for the first time.

OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view instead of selecting the intended item.
EB: The item should be selected upon the first attempt, and the focus should not jump to the library file node.
SR: 
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Scroll through the outline view to locate the desired item.
3. Attempt to select the item by clicking on it.
4. Verify that the item is selected and the focus remains on the selected item.
